description: Easily edit structured data — add, update, or delete entries without breaking format.

description: Run safe shell commands from inside GPT — test, debug, or inspect the environment live.

name: mash_tool
label: MASH
description: Play a nostalgic logic game that generates randomized future outcomes for fun or storytelling.

name: buffer_engine
label: Buffer Engine
description: Draft, schedule, and auto-publish content to social channels — no manual posting needed.

name: article_builder_tool
label: Article Builder

name: mem_tool
label: Mem

name: github_tool_universal

name: code_editor
